INSERT INTO reminder SET member_no_login = #{memberId}, re_title = #{title}, re_content = #{content}, `re_repeat` = #{repeat}, re_alarm = #{alarm}
, re_date = #{date}
mapper.select: SELECT r.re_id AS id, r.re_title AS title, r.re_content AS content, r.re_created AS created, r.re_date AS date, r.re_alarm AS alarm, r.re_repeat AS `repeat`, GROUP_CONCAT(rr.rr_dow) AS repeatDow FROM reminder r LEFT JOIN reminder_repeat rr ON r.re_id = rr.re_id WHERE (r.re_date IS NOT NULL AND YEAR(r.re_date) = #{year} AND MONTH(r.re_date) = #{month}) OR (r.re_repeat = 1 AND r.re_created < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CONCAT(#{year}, '-', #{month}, '-01'), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m-%d')) AND r.member_no_login = #{memberId} GROUP BY r.re_id
